com.lime.bean
Class Module

java.lang.Object
  com.lime.bean.Module

public class Module
extends java.lang.Object

A bean describing a module. A bean of this type is initialized by Lime for every module of your application that is deployed. The bean is also registered in the module's context with name "moduleDescriptor"

Author:
Daniele Milani
